title: NFC West Preview
itunes:title: NFC West Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Kevin Patra – react to the latest NFL news, including Steelers running back Le'Veon Bell’s suspension being reduced to three games. Then the heroes break down the Thursday night slate of Preseason Week 2 games before previewing the NFC West. Plus, stay tuned in for Colleen Wolfe and her husband, John Gonzalez, as they debut their new mini-podcast “Marital Blitz”!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
